Useful links
The links below are not affiliated with playshogi.com
Playing shogi online:
81 Dojo: Online shogi server, with English and Japanese interface. Highly recommended.
Shogi club 24: Online shogi server, with basic English support. The interface is old (Java applet), a lot of strong players.
lishogi: A brand new shogi server, derived from the popular lichess. Very nice interface, not many players yet, but growing.
HEROZ Shogi Wars: Newer shogi server, with basic English support. Fast and crazy games, easy to find opponents. You can only play 3 games per day for free. Recommended on mobile.
Shogi news:
ShogiHub: News about the professional shogi world in English.
FESA: Official website of the Federation of European Shogi Associations. News about tournaments in Europe.
Shogi Harbour: An English-language website dedicated to Shogi promotion, including some tutorials.
YouTube channels:
HIDETCHI: A lot of great videos in English - Beginners will learn with "How to play Shogi", more experienced players can learn a lot from "Shogi Openings" or "Famous Shogi Games".
Shogi Harbour: A newer and active English shogi channel with tutorials and game commentaries by the only non-Japanese Ladies Professional player.
